headline: How to Quickly Recover From a Holiday Debt Hangover
abstract: Experts suggest everything from following a three-month repayment plan to selling used clothes and toys or temporarily reducing your 401(k) contributions.
lead_paragraph: The holiday decorations have been put away, the gift boxes recycled. Now it’s time to pay the cost of December’s gift and entertainment binge.
keywords: National Assn of Personal Financial Advisors
